General.Name: KWG Group Holdings Limited
General.Description: KWG Group Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development and investment, and hotel operation businesses. Its property portfolio includes mid- to high-end residential properties, serviced apartments, villas, offices, hotels, and shopping malls. The company was formerly known as KWG Property Holding Limited and changed its name to KWG Group Holdings Limited in August 2018. KWG Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: KWG International Finance Place, Guangzhou, China, 510623
